abilities.description: When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.703964b8d02355b8]{Resupply} to gain gear or provisions for your ship’s hold, you and your allies take +1 momentum for each +2 supply gained through this action.

Your ship’s hold is stocked with reserves. When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.0fcfea7696d1de15]{Sacrifice Resources} and your hold supply is reduced to 0, first roll +integrity instead of marking unprepared. On a strong hit, take +1 supply. On a weak hit or miss, mark unprepared.

Your hold is fitted with secret compartments. When the ship undergoes an inspection or search, @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.bd6278f18bbd6739]{Ask the Oracle} if the compartments stay hidden, setting the odds as @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedoracles.c8932747032413a7]{likely}. If the answer is no, the searchers are suspicious, but you may @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} to distract or direct their attention elsewhere; if you do, reroll any dice.
